job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <p><strong><u>Data Scientist</u></strong></p><p>18 month contract through Kelly Services </p><p>Client is in Muskegon MI but open to seeing remote candidates. Preferably in the Eastern timezone to help with working hours. </p><p>&nbsp;Offers competitive compensation and full benefits package </p><p><br></p><p>Responsibilities:</p><p><span>• Big data experience </span></p><p>• Provide timely response to internal customer inquiries via telephone, business e-mail, meetings, etc.&nbsp;</p><p>• Perform data analytics using various tools (SAP, BW, Power BI, Python, SAS etc.).</p><p>• Statistic expertise</p><p>• May be responsible for several components of a project or a complex component of a larger project.&nbsp;</p><p>• Contribute to their team or department by applying their knowledge of one or more functional areas.&nbsp;</p><p>• Responsible for compiling data from multiple databases to extract market trends, sales forecasts, etc.&nbsp;</p><p>• Support PAP process, month/quarter end sales monitoring and initiatives.</p><p>• M2M coordination using multiple platforms including EDI, SPEC2000, etc.</p><p>• Perform Customer Master Data maintenance.&nbsp;</p><p>• Provide General Business Support, as required.&nbsp;</p><p>• Other projects as assigned by leadership team.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>Qualifications:</p><p><br></p><p>• Fully developed professional with excellent communication and organizational skills and able to work without direct guidance of others.</p><p>• Must be self-motivated with a strong sense of urgency. Should be able to prioritize and balance workload, plan ahead to ensure deadlines/goals are met, and make sound decisions in a fast-paced environment.&nbsp;</p><p>• Must possess a ‘customer first’ mindset toward both the client and their customers, always exhibiting the highest level of business support.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p>• Must be able to perform data analytics using various tools (Power BI, SAP, BW, Python, SAS, etc.)&nbsp;</p><p>• Excellent MS Office Suite skills (Excel /VBA).</p><p>• Bachelor’s degree (4-7 years of experience) or Master’s degree (2- 5 years of experience) in Computer Science or Industrial Engineering.</p><p>• Must be a team player with a passion for excellence.</p><p>• Must maintain excellent attendance record.&nbsp;</p><p></p>
